title: Kefa II Pro
content:
[Kefa II Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414014726/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jeremie-hornus/kefa-ii-pro/) is available on MyFonts with a Big Bargain introductory promotion of 90% discount until August 16.  
 [
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414014726im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Flag_6733.png)
](http://web.archive.org/)
author: jeremieh

comments.content:
Hooray!  
Just bought Kefa 2 Pro and Schoiffer Sans at fontspring.

But i am missing proportional lining figures in the web-fonts.  
Only the proportional oldstyle figures are in the ttf.  
An update would be very very nice!

Greetings,  
Mikko
